entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ApiCompat loading of Roslyn on NETFramework is unreliable #46958
  • native aot cross build failed in linux #46948
  • Dotnet build is not able to map normalized TFMs #46947
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload set]With 9.0.104 SDK installed on win-x64, Warning "The specified version does not contain a valid major, minor, and patch version: '9.0.102.1' displays when switch back to loose manifests if workload set version is "9.0.102.1" #46946
  • dotnet publish error when using Sentry sdk #46952
  • It is recommended to add MaxSegmentSize to Socket.SetSocketOption #46930

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly build fails when containing folder has a parenthesis 9.0.200 #46802
  • redist-installer.csproj : error NU1101: Unable to find package microsoft.netcore.app.crossgen2.linux-s390x. #46943
  • dotnet test --blame-hang - Possible typo in help #46929

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo for forwarding the DAC signing arguments #46959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove incorrect text from --blame-hang docs #46942
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update preview branding #46953
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove vertical priority list #46741
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Write import map to html files #46233
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Don't restore crossgen packs on unsupported envs #46944
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix utility HaveStdErrContainingOnce #46893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for the Feb release #46928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try to re-enable APICompat in aspnetcore #45872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • create rpms that track inner directories for cleanup #44119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2646152 #46803
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use package download in generate layout #46925
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make DefineStaticWebAssets incremental #46920
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Branch Lockdown
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Add ExcludeFromCodeCoverage to template for MSTest, NUnit, XUnit #46866
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools, Branch Lockdown
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Hide stack on WorkloadResolver constructor error #38091
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers, Branch Lockdown
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    Area-Tools, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.2xx
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Workloads: Support VS component IDs #44198
    DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown, 10.0.1xx
  • Switch to spliting our test work items by method instead of class. #44898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Use the static factory for creating a logger #45009
    untriaged, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 R2R resolve #45236
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun, Branch Lockdown
  • Split tests by method rather than class #45520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update Helix queues to osx.15.amd64|arm64 #45543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update all test sdk references to the latest version. #45548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [Static web assets] Be more leanient when applying compression negotiation #45598
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Branch Lockdown
  • Refactor GetPackageNameFromDependency #45873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Investigate Helix Arm64 timeouts #46243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Do not pass raw messages to string.Format #46479
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.3
